tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE file_relations (
    relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id INT,
    tag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES file_metadata(file_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES file_tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FilePermissions (
  permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  file_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  permission_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES FileMetadata(file_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FileVersions (
  version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  file_id INT,
  version_number INT NOT NULL,
  version_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES FileMetadata(file_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FilesMetadata (
    file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    file_size INT NOT NULL,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FileTags (
    tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    file_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES FilesMetadata (file_id)
)

CREATE TABLE FilePermissions (
    permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FileComments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    file_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES FilesMetadata (file_id)
)

CREATE TABLE FileLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    file_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES FilesMetadata (file_id)
)
